full_title: Red Leather by Future, Metro Boomin & J. Cole
title: Red Leather

description.plain:
“Red Leather” marks the first collaboration between Atlanta’s rapper Future and J. Cole.
This hit record was produced by Atlanta’s notorious trap pioneer Metro Boomin.

Although, the feature from J. Cole on this song made everyone end up being surprised & confused due to an reignited on-going beef (started with Kendrick Lamar’s feature on “Like That”), & after he apologized to K. Dot at Dreamville Festival 2024

embed_content: Read “Red Leather” by Future, Metro Boomin & J. Cole on Genius

body.plain:
“Red Leather” marks the first collaboration between Atlanta’s rapper Future and J. Cole.
This hit record was produced by Atlanta’s notorious trap pioneer Metro Boomin.

Although, the feature from J. Cole on this song made everyone end up being surprised & confused due to an reignited on-going beef (started with Kendrick Lamar’s feature on “Like That”), & after he apologized to K. Dot at Dreamville Festival 2024
